```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
library(vitae)
library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
ss <- gs4_get(gs4_find("cv_elisa"))
```


# Education

```{r EDUCATION}
read_sheet(ss, sheet = "education") |>
  detailed_entries(
    with = degree,
    what = institution,
    why = detail,
    when = glue::glue("{startMonth} {startYear} --> {endMonth} {endYear}",.na = ""),
    where = location
  )
```

# Research

## Working Papers
